text: Allen Raphael Ritter (born June 19, 1988), is an American record producer, songwriter, singer and pianist. He has produced for a variety of artists, most notably Drake, Travis Scott, Kanye West, Rihanna, and Nicki Minaj, among others. ==Discography== ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! style="width:15em;" | Title !
